content.query:
SELECT TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synbsxdexz4eghw5a.blob.core.windows.net/rawdata/local-data/person.csv',
        FORMAT='CSV'
    ) AS [persons]


SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://contosolake.dfs.core.windows.net/users/NYCTaxi/PassengerCountStats_parquetformat/part-00000-1f251a58-d8ac-4972-9215-8d528d490690-c000.snappy.parquet',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
) AS [result]
